name: Add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from a new Delighted response
description:
Every time a new response is collected in Delighted, a new row containing response details will be added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KD60ql1wRRYhhlHyD3lC6aOzPAVcC0jrQBMZdkn9u_w/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the destination for the Delighted responses. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is processing the "Thumbs" survey type. More about Delighted survey types can be found [here.](https://help.delighted.com/article/530-survey-types-overview)
